long_description: Nathan LED Reflective Cycling Vest not only supplies 360deg of reflectivity, it boasts an integrated strip of LED lights for excellent visibility in dim light. Rear of vest features a vertical, flexible and removable LED strip that has 3 light settings for up to 150 hrs. of illumination; battery is replaceable. Made from soft, breathable mesh and reflective material that allows you to be seen up to 1,200 ft. away. Extended tail offers coverage in the bent-over cycling position; reflective strap keepers keep the adjustable side straps from flapping in the wind. Horizontal opening across back provides easy access to bike jersey pockets. Small loop on the back lets you secure a LED safety light for additional visibility (light sold separately). The Nathan LED Reflective Cycling Vest can be adjusted to fine-tune the fit; one size fits most.
short_description: Nathan LED Reflective Cycling Vest not only supplies 360deg of reflectivity, it boasts an integrated strip of LED lights for excellent visibility in dim light.
